publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-558 Fiona Hyslop: The Draft Protection of Charities Assets (Exemption) (Scotland) Amendment Order 2007—That the Education, Lifelong Learning and Culture Committee recommends that the draft Protection of Charities Assets (Exemption) (Scotland) Amendment Order 2007 be approved. Supported by: Adam Ingram*, Maureen Watt*
